snippet: The shooting of a young pharmacist has become a rallying cry for critics of the government, who are now threatening its grip on power.
abstract: Killing of pharmacist Salah Sanhouri by Sudanese security forces stokes anger and becomes rallying cry for protest movement that started after Sudan's government lifted subsidies on gasoline, creating energy crisis that compounded existing economic crisis.
lead_paragraph: The shooting of a young pharmacist has become a rallying cry for critics of the government, who are now threatening its grip on power.

headline.main: A Killing by Sudanese Security Forces Stokes the Anger of a Protest Movement
headline.print_headline: A Killing by Sudanese Security Forces Stokes the Anger of a Protest Movement

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
